summary: The user has strong privacy control but needs improvement in phishing awareness, password management, and security attitude.

recommendations.text: Improve your awareness of phishing threats by regularly reviewing common phishing tactics and testing yourself with online quizzes.
recommendations.reason: Phishing awareness is crucial as it helps you avoid scams that can lead to data theft or financial loss.

recommendations.text: Enable two-factor authentication (2FA) on all your major accounts to add an extra layer of security.
recommendations.reason: 2FA significantly reduces the risk of unauthorized access to your accounts, even if your password is compromised.

recommendations.text: Regularly update and strengthen your passwords using a password manager.
recommendations.reason: Weak and reused passwords are easy targets for hackers; a password manager can help you create and store complex passwords securely.

recommendations.text: Enhance your content visibility awareness and be cautious about what you share publicly online.
recommendations.reason: Understanding who can see your information helps protect your privacy and prevents unwanted exposure.
